attributes.action: Stop the government privatising Royal Mail
attributes.additional_details:
The government want to privatise the Royal Mail which means BFPO (British Forces Post Office) postage will no longer be free.
This will be the end of a vital lifeline between thoses in the forces and their families.
Please sign this petition in hope we can keep this lifeline alive. For our troops, for their sanity. To hear from their wives/husbands, parents and other family members.
Thank you for your time to help a great cause! !
